topic.title: Intramural Sports at Virginia Tech!
topic.shortdesc: One of the best ways to get involved on campus is joining an intramural sports team. Whether you are an athletic junkie, missing high school sports, or want a way to meet friends, intramural sports are calling your name!

body.p: Intramural Sports are played on campus, and are enjoyed by faculty, staff, and students. Not only is intramural sports a great way to meet new friendly faces; it is an easy way to stay active, keep busy, and tap into that competitive side you've been hiding since high school.

No experience is necessary for intramural sports! A membership is available which allows you to participate in any sport for the duration of the year. Join others in chess, soccer, horseshoes, or or the millions of other sports provided, Try them all!

Each sport has the goal of receiving the HokieGrail at the end of the "season". This award is given to the All University Intramural Champion based off of a point system. For more information regarding intramurals, be sure to join the intramural list serve to receive updates and informative emails.
